'''Zhiqiao''' {{Lang|zh=芷巧|zh_rm=''Zhiqiǎo''}} is a quest-exclusive [[NPC]] that appears in the {{Quest|A Teapot to Call Home: Part I}}.

In the quest, she signed a contract with [[Krosl]] to rent some [[Smaragdus Jadeite]].
